name: Alice Gear Aegis CS: Concerto of Simulatrix - Limited Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following:
- Alice Gear Aegis CS: Concerto of Simulatrix
- Alice Gear Aegis CS Non-Scale Kaede Agatsuma
- Alice Gear Aegis CS Non-Scale Sitara Kaneshiya
- Alice Gear Aegis CS Marking Set A
- Alice Gear Aegis CS Marking Set B
